name: Crowned Heads - Luminosa - Churchill
additionalNotes: The Crowned Heads Luminosa is handmade in the Dominican Republic by the famed E.P. Carrillo Cigar Company. This hefty cigar features a nice brown Ecuadorian Connecticut Shade wrapper over a Nicaraguan binder and filler. The Luminosa’s flavor profile serves double-duty as a morning smoke or as an after-dinner indulgence.  This is a dark a shade of Ecuadorian Connecticut with a silky complexion wrapper.The band of the Luminosa is highlighted by its bright orange background. The center of the band has the text “LUMINOSA” in a modern font on a black stripe. The black stripe sits on a circular field with gold, orange, and black adornments creating a sunburst-like design.
